pages.text: The $(mob)Snow Golem$() is an artificial creature that can be assembled by players. It targets nearby hostile monsters and throws $(item)Snowballs$() at them, provoking them but not dealing damage.$(p)It leaves a trail of $(item)Snow$() behind, takes damage under rain and in hot biomes. The $(item)Pumpkin$() on its head can be hidden by shearing it with $(item)Shears$().
Assembling a $(mob)Snow Golem$(), place the $(item)Pumpkin$() last.
